description:
Strength as a human, the power to rend evil--With the power inherited from his father, Toujou Jin, Basara faces off against Zolgia. Basara is driven by the desire to protect his precious family. That desire gives him strength, and even as Zolgia pushes him to the edge, he rises without breaking. However, even Basara eventually runs out of strength facting that all too powerful might.
His mind in despair, he`s unable to escape from Zolgia`s dominion...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Espionage... Sono Saki ni Aru Mono
Espionnage... ce qui attend au bout de la route
諜報者[エスピオナージ]...その先にあるもの
